articles.author: Hormaz Fatakia
articles.title: PFC Share Price: Stock gains 100% in a calendar year for the first time since listing in 2008 - CNBCTV18
articles.description: This is the first time that PFC's shares have doubled in a calendar year after listing in 2008. The previous best year for the stock was 2009, when it had gained 96 percent.
